thread.title: Canadian Businesses Fear Investment Loss to U.S. After Tax Cuts

author: Paul Vieira
title: Canadian Businesses Fear Investment Loss to U.S. After Tax Cuts
text:
OTTAWA—Canadian businesses are pushing the government to cut corporate taxes, fearing they will lose investment to the U.S. following the sweeping tax overhaul that the White House signed into law late last year. 
The Liberal government is expected to say what, if anything, it plans to do in response to the U.S. move—which reduced the corporate tax rate to its lowest point since 1939—when Finance Minister Bill Morneau delivers his annual budget plan on Tuesday afternoon. 
...
